description: Nonparametric Wilcoxon signed-rank test for paired comparisons of two samples

workmem.title: Workspace memory in megabytes
workmem.description: Number of megabytes of RAM to use for statistical workspace

dset1_x.title: Dataset 1 for X observations
dset1_x.description: Data set for X observations. The user must specify 1 and only 1 sub-brick with each -dset command.

dset2_y.title: Dataset 2 for Y observations
dset2_y.description: Data set for Y observations. The user must specify 1 and only 1 sub-brick with each -dset command.

output_prefix.title: Output file prefix
output_prefix.description: Estimated population delta and Wilcoxon signed-rank statistics are written to file
